system.description:
You ready your shield or weapon, anticipating an attack.

Spend 1 Beat to ready yourself. Gain Block 2.

Hesitation Is Defeat: Spend 2 Beats. Before gaining Block, rush 4, moving through enemies, inflicting 1 Hit on each enemy and taunting them until the end of your next riff.

Perfect Parry: Spend 3 Beats. Before the end of your next riff, if Block gained from this technique is lost, immediately inflict 1 True Hit back at the one that depleted your Block.
system.flavor: "Ever ready. That is what kawal must be. Now bring your weapons up. We have a datu to save." - War Leader Katuna, as he goes on to save a hostaged datu from a rival banwa.
